page.title: 01Mrs.C.L.Stokes her day
page.content: Mrs.C.L.Stokes (mum,book-keeper PTA treasurer) Written after one years back trouble whilst awaiting a spinal operation. A day in the life 04/06/85: 6.30 On waking the day looked boring and depressing. 7.30 My legs began to give way forcing me back to bed(fairly common). 9.00 Having taken my son to the doctor, my husband returned to inform me that the doctor would call on me that afternoon. 9.30-10.30 I arranged a coffee morning in my bedroom and compiled a list of points to raise with my doctor lest he should escape before I had my say. 10.30 - 12.00 The coffee break became a discussion on a local dispute in which I had inadvertantly become involved. This ended when the doctor let himself in. 12.00-1.00 I spent voicing angry opinions to, and extracting information from my doctor. No good
